subject: Initial discovery call
notes: Discussed their current CRM challenges and pain points. They're using spreadsheets currently and looking for better automation. Key requirements: reporting, mobile access, and integration with their accounting software.

subject: Product demo presentation
notes: Presented core CRM features to Michael and his team. They were particularly interested in the financial reporting capabilities and ROI tracking. Next step: technical requirements gathering.

subject: Integration requirements follow-up
notes: Sent detailed technical specifications for patient management system integration. Included API documentation and implementation timeline.

subject: Mobile app requirements discussion
notes: David outlined specific mobile needs for their 50+ field sales team. Offline functionality is crucial. Discussed pricing for enterprise mobile licenses.

subject: Retail solution walkthrough
notes: Showed Lisa how our customer segmentation tools can help increase repeat business. She wants to see case studies from other retail clients.

subject: Contract negotiation call
notes: Finalized contract terms with Robert. Agreed on enterprise pricing and 3-year commitment. Contract signed and deal closed!

subject: Follow-up on implementation timeline
notes: Sarah called to discuss accelerating the implementation. Their current system is causing significant issues and they want to fast-track the project.

subject: Proposal sent
notes: Sent comprehensive proposal including technical requirements, pricing, and implementation timeline. Proposal valid for 30 days.
